column5: Well, the colonel ok'd it and hopefully the girls don't mind too much. I'm heading up to Buckhorn Friday afternoon to my buddies cottage to get the boats in the water and to wet a line on midnight hunting for some north Kawartha walleye. His cottage is just outside of town (supposedly walking distance) and I am looking forward to doing some fishing.
enjoy!  if you find the bite tough, dont be affraid to think "outside the box" for them Kawartha 'eyes
Let us know how it goes.  I fish Buckhorn too and should be there on Saturday chasing walleye!  Jackie
Good luck on the trip.  Stock up on some bucktails before ya go and also jigs, and shad raps.
Stoney Lk is where i am going to be foe the opener! GOOD LUCK ALL.
Oh boy "rip jiggi'n" in the dark   Good luck
